00048 using namespace std;
00049 using namespace Hypertable;

00051 
00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   struct CommandCallback : HqlInterpreter::Callback {
00055     CommandInterpreter &commander;
00056     int command;
00057     boost::progress_display *progress;
00058     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00059 
00060     CommandCallback(CommandInterpreter &interp)
00061       : HqlInterpreter::Callback(interp.normal_mode()), commander(interp),
00062         command(0), progress(0) {
00063       format_ts_in_usecs = interp.timestamp_output_format()
00064           == CommandInterpreter::TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_USECS;
00065       output = stdout; // set to stdout
00066     }
00067 
00068     ~CommandCallback() {
00069       if (progress)
00070         delete progress;
00071 
00072       if (output == stdout || output == stderr)
00073         fflush(output);
00074       else if (output)
00075         fclose(output);
00076     }
00077 
00078     virtual void on_parsed(ParserState &state) { command = state.command; }
00079 
00080     virtual void on_return(const String &str) { cout << str << endl; }
00081 
00082     virtual void on_update(size_t total) {
00083       if (!normal_mode)
00084         return;
00085 
00086       HT_ASSERT(command);
00087 
00088       if (command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA) {
00089         HT_ASSERT(!progress);
00090         cout <<"\nLoading "<< format_number(total)
00091              <<" bytes of input data..." << endl;
00092         progress = new boost::progress_display(total);
00093       }
00094     }
00095 
00096     virtual void on_progress(size_t amount) {
00097       HT_ASSERT(progress);
00098       *progress += amount;
00099     }
00100 
00101     virtual void on_finish(TableMutator *mutator) {
00102       Callback::on_finish(mutator);
00103       stopwatch.stop();
00104 
00105       if (normal_mode) {
00106         if (progress && progress->count() < file_size)
00107           *progress += file_size - progress->count();
00108 
00109         double elapsed = stopwatch.elapsed();
00110 
00111         if (command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA)
00112           fprintf(stderr, "Load complete.\n");
00113 
00114         fputc('\n', stderr);
00115         fprintf(stderr, "  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", elapsed);
00116 
00117         if (total_values_size)
00118           fprintf(stderr, "Avg value size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00119                  (double)total_values_size / total_cells);
00120 
00121         if (total_keys_size)
00122           fprintf(stderr, "  Avg key size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00123                  (double)total_keys_size / total_cells);
00124 
00125         if (total_keys_size && total_values_size) {
00126           fprintf(stderr, "    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s",
00127                  (total_keys_size + total_values_size) / elapsed);
00128 
00129           if (file_size)
00130             fprintf(stderr, " (%.2f bytes/s)", file_size / elapsed);
00131 
00132           fputc('\n', stderr);
00133         }
00134         if (total_cells) {
00135           fprintf(stderr, "   Total cells:  %llu\n", (Llu)total_cells);
00136           fprintf(stderr, "    Throughput:  %.2f cells/s\n",
00137                  total_cells / elapsed);
00138         }
00139         if (mutator)
00140           fprintf(stderr, "       Resends:  %llu\n",
00141                   (Llu)mutator->get_resend_count());
00142 
00143         fflush(stderr);
00144       }
00145     }
00146   };
00147 
00148 } // local namespace

00151 HqlCommandInterpreter::HqlCommandInterpreter(Client *client)
00152     : m_interp(new HqlInterpreter(client)) {
00153 }

00156 HqlCommandInterpreter::HqlCommandInterpreter(HqlInterpreter *interp)
00157     : m_interp(interp) {
00158 }

00161 void HqlCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00162   CommandCallback cb(*this);
00163   m_interp->execute(line, cb);
00164 }
